DESCRIPTION: Configura o modulo Anti-Everyone do Auto-Addon.
EVERYONE1: Oops! You must enter days in **Numbers**. Example: `20`
EVERYONE2:
Oops! The module option must be between 0-3.
0 = disable
1 = delete message
2 = apply a warning to the user
3 = both (1 & 2)
EVERYONE6: Oops! This channel has already been added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE7: Oops! This post has already been added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE9: Oops! This user has already been added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE11: Oops! I don't seem to have permission to access this channel, or it doesn't exist. Check and try again.
EVERYONE12: `[AUTO-MOD]` <#{{channel}} was successfully added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE13: Oops! I don't seem to have permission to access this channel, or it doesn't exist. Check and try again.
EVERYONE14: `[AUTO-MOD]` <#{{channel}}> has been successfully removed from the whitelist.
EVERYONE16: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@&{{role}}> has been successfully added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE17: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@&{{role}}> has been successfully removed from the whitelist.
EVERYONE19: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@{{user}}> has been successfully added to the whitelist.
EVERYONE20: `[AUTO-MOD]` <@{{user}}> has been successfully removed from the whitelist.
